mapper.insert: insert into loginAccount ( loginAccount, password, role, mobilePhone, sex, nickname, headimgurl, country, city, province, createTime, status ) values ( #{loginAccount}, #{password}, #{role}, #{mobilePhone}, #{sex}, #{nickname}, #{headimgurl}, #{country}, #{city}, #{province}, #{createTime}, #{status} )
mapper.select: select count(id) from loginAccount where loginAccount = #{loginAccount}
